text: Hi everyone! I have a question regarding Templates for blog posts and I hope someone can help me :smile: What are the exact requisites for a template to appear in the Template selection listing (see image 1)? I have two HTML files with the same template annotations (actually, the code is the same for both) and one appears in the listing and the other one not  :sweat_smile:  I tried modifying the annotations but it doesn’t help…
I'd like to be able to have a color selected when using a template and then have that color value feed into the CSS. Is this possible?

Currently, if I create a page and assign it a template, then later update the template, the page does not reflect the change made to the template.  I have to delete the page and recreate it in order to see the change.  And, that causes my content to have to be rebuilt.  How can I make my template changes apply to all of the pages that are using that template, when I save and publish the template change?
